DOC.brief_summary: The etiologies of varicose veins and the progression to more serious forms of chronic venous disease and identification of appropriate diagnostic tests to better aid patient management by identifying individuals who may benefit from more aggressive treatment and/ or prophylactic measures.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of MTHFR Polymorphisms in Venous Disease
DOC.criteria: Age 18 or over No venous disease (N=30); or C2C3 venous disease (N=30); or C4C6 venous disease (N=30) Pregnancy Cancer Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) Any systemic inflammatory disease Any of the following within the previous 30 days: Trauma Any surgery Periods of prolonged inactivity
